src:
Solskjaer Diklaim Blunder Saat Tangani Marcus Rashford, Mengapa?
04 Nov 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah klaim dibuat oleh Garth Crooks terkait kekalahan Manchester United melawan Bournemouth. Crooks menilai bahwa United kalah di laga itu karena ia terlalu memforsir Marcus Rashford.
Manchester United yang tengah membangun momentum positif harus meyudahi tren apik mereka di akhir pekan kemarin. Mereka harus tumbang di markas Bournemouth dengan skor tipis 1-0.
Pada laga itu, United sebenarnya memiliki sejumlah peluang matang. Namun mereka gagal mengonversi peluang itu dengan baik sehingga mereka harus tumbang di tangan The Cherries.
Crooks percaya bahwa kegagalan MU mengonversi peluang karena timnya terlalu bergantung terhadap Marcus Rashford. "Saya rasa bahwa saat ini ada ketergantungan yang besar dari Ole Gunnar Solskjaer kepada Marcus Rashford," ujar Crooks kepada BBC Sports.

Baca komentar lengkap eks pemain MU itu di bawha ini.
text:
Solskjaer Claimed Blunder When Handling Marcus Rashford, Why?
Nov 04 2019, 19:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A claim made by Garth Crooks regarding Manchester United's defeat against Bournemouth. Crooks considered that United lost the match because he over-emphasized Marcus Rashford.
Manchester United, who are building positive momentum, have to end their neat trends over the weekend. They must fall at the headquarters of Bournemouth with a thin score of 1-0.
In that match, United actually has a number of mature opportunities. But they failed to convert the opportunity so well that they had to fall in the hands of The Cherries.
Crooks believes that the failure of MU to convert opportunities because his team is too dependent on Marcus Rashford. "I feel that at the moment there is a large dependency from Ole Gunnar Solskjaer to Marcus Rashford," Crooks told BBC Sports.

Read the full comments of the former Manchester United player below.
